website_summaries.verdict: With a touch screen and 300-degree hinge, the Lenovo N20p Chromebook lets you tap and flip, but its higher price and performance that's the same as the competition means it's sort of a one-trick pony.

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a Chromebook, you can't go wrong with this. 4GB RAM and SSD make it snappy. Good touch screen that does unfortunately suffer from glare issues (I'm not criticising this product as I haven't yet used a touch screen that doesn't have this problem). Reasonable weight and portability with good sized easy to use keyboard. Rotating screen may be useful for some (but not me as I'm not using it for films etc.) I you're looking for a Chromebook and want one of this size, I think you can't really go far wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roycroft

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great then died
customer_reviews.text: Died for no reason at all after the warranty was gone. No moving parts really should not have died where it was utterly un-recoverable.
customer_reviews.author: Armisis Aieoln

customer_reviews.title: The Chromebook is fast and well made. The only ...
customer_reviews.text: The Chromebook is fast and well made. The only negative that I would comment on is that, if you insert an SD card, it does not go right into the Chromebook, at least 1/3 sticks out, so you would not want to leave it there when carrying the machine around.
customer_reviews.author: M J Brooks

customer_reviews.title: ... respects this machine is every bit as functional and useful as the other Chromebook I have had for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard may not suit everyone as it gives the impression of being a bit flimsy but it works OK and in all other respects this machine is every bit as functional and useful as the other Chromebook I have had for a couple of years (a Samsung) which is as good as new despite daily usage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Chromebooks will become popular
customer_reviews.text: Really great machine for the price. High quality and good image. Very clever!
customer_reviews.author: Peter B. Vos

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: with a lot of use the keys start to fail.
customer_reviews.author: david reed

customer_reviews.title: the keyboard is great to use - the shaped keys make a difference
customer_reviews.text: as well built as I expect from Lenovo. Apart from that, the keyboard is great to use - the shaped keys make a difference. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: jan foy

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what i need, taking to work, writing documents and coming home to browse the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: So light, so fast, good screen and keyboard. Not for everyone I know but for me useful 99% of the time. Printing for example is a pain! If, like me it is for surfing, doing emails etc you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cherokee40

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great c/book handy to be able touch screen also,boot up in seconds online so fast,Great.
customer_reviews.author: michael fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was quite dissapointed to find how small it was.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Keppel

customer_reviews.title: that gets a better wi fi signal
customer_reviews.text: ask me in six months, google wants to increase it's influence, become a chromie, it tells you get all your stuff in one place. We buy a product for a purpose, not to jump through hoops to get what we want. I bought the chromebook to replace this old dell laptop that keeps crashing, Guess what I am using, my old dell, that gets a better wi fi signal, way better sound, and is more forgiving. Change that improves, I can bear with, but changing to have something new on the market, I can live without. Plus the instructions are on the computer, what a windup.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Defective keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The down arrow key only work half of the time. Refunded immediately. Will try to order again to see if it is a one off.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant piece of kit. Effortless to set up. So easy to use. The launch speed and silence is perfect. The touchscreen is really useful Some reviews elsewhere out there mention of the keyboard having give in the middle - not the case with the one I've got, it's totally rigid. The 'online' environment is great - a bit of a release compared to being so used to software installed on your machine (the constant need for updates and anti-virus checking etc). Would not hesitate to recommend to anybody. In you've not heard of Lenovo, they took over from IBM - whom I'm sure you'll have heard of. A big company who've produced a decent Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: Lenovo N20p Multimode Touchscreen Chromebook (Grey) - (Intel CDC N2830 2.16 GHz, 4 GB RAM, 16 GB SSD, Integrated Graphics, Webcam, Micro HDMI, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Chrome OS)
product_meta.description:
LENOVO N20P CHROMEBOOK
DELIVERING PERFORMANCE AND VALUE AT HOME, WORK AND THE CLASSROOM
Learn, explore, and create. The Lenovo N20p Chromebook uses Google’s Chrome OS to make navigating the Internet simple and accessible. Make the most of the light and thin design to get more out of the web -- wherever you need it. 

DUAL-MODE PRODUCTIVITY
Work through your to-do list in Laptop mode. Make the most of the integrated AccuType keyboard and touchpad and see your productivity soar. With Stand mode, you can stay in touch wherever you are. With its stable mechanical hinge design, the N20p Chrome’s Stand mode is the ideal way to enjoy video chat and entertainment, via touch applications and the integrated 720p camera. 

AT A GLANCE
 *  11.6-inch HD (1366 x 768) display with 10-point multi-touch technology 
 *  Intel Celeron N2830 processor
 *  4 GB DDR3L memory
 *  16 GB eMMC storage
 *  Pre-loaded with Google's easy-to-use Chrome OS
 *  Stereo speakers
 *  720p webcam
 *  802.11 a/c Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 4.0 
 *  Up to eight hours of use between charges

GOOGLE CHROME OPERATING SYSTEM
Google Chrome and Lenovo have joined forces to create the ideal device for managing your school report card and day-to-day life. The Chrome Web Store has access to thousands of applications that help you succeed in the classroom and beyond. 

10-POINT MULTI-TOUCH DISPLAY
Enjoy greater accuracy with the 10-point multi-touch display, which allows you to interact with your Lenovo N20p Chromebook using fun hand gestures and swipes. Easily share files, photos, videos and more with tablet-style display with easy scroll and zoom functions. 

ACCUTYPE KEYBOARD
The finger-friendly curved key shape and ergonomic spacebar of the AccuType keyboard will work together to make it easier to type and reduce the number of typos, wherever you find yourself working. 

ULTRA-THIN. ULTRA-LIGHT. ULTRA-RESPONSIVE
 Packed with a powerful Intel Celeron N2830 processor and preloaded with Google Chrome OS, the thin and light Lenovo N20p Chromebook weighs up to 1.4 kg (3.1 Ibs) and is only 17.9 mm at its thickest -- making it easy to carry around.

FAST MEMORY AND SSD STORAGE
 On the Lenovo N20p Chromebook you'll find 4 GB of fast DDR3L memory, up to 16 GB of Solid State Drive (SSD) storage*. SSDs help you to access your files much faster than traditional hard drives, allowing faster application loading, as well as reduced start-up and shut-down times.
*Only available on selected models.

720P WEBCAM
Take your web chats to another level thanks to the built-in webcam. Your friends and family will be able to see you in clear 720p resolution, which means the picture will look good even on a large TV screen. The webcam also has enhanced low light capabilities, which means you'll always be looking your best whatever the lighting conditions.

MICROHDMI FOR BIG SCREEN ENTERTAINMENT
You can also enjoy your multimedia on the big screen by using the built-in microHDMI-out port to hook your laptop up to a HDTV, monitor or projector -- ideal for sharing your favourite videos with friends.

CONNECTIVITY AND SECURITY
The Lenovo N20p Chromebook comes with multiple wireless connection options. The built-in 802.11 a/c Wi-Fi adapter will allow you to enjoy reliable connections to the internet, while Bluetooth 4.0 makes it easier to connect and share files with other devices. You can also connect a compatible USB 3.0 device, such as an external drive, offering transfer rates 10 times faster than a standard USB 2.0.

There are a large number of connectivity options available with the Lenovo N20p Chromebook:

 *  1x USB 2.0 and 1x USB 3.0 ports 
 * 1x HDMI output 
 * Audio Combo Jack (headphone and mic)
 * Two-in-one card reader (SD/MMC)

LONG-LASTING BATTERY LIFE
The Lenovo N20p Chromebook comes equipped with a long-life battery, so you can get the most out of your laptop PC between charges. You will be able to enjoy up to eight hours* of Wi-Fi browsing before it needs to be topped up.
**Battery life is an estimated maximum. Actual battery life may vary based on many factors. 



BOX CONTAINS


Lenovo LaptopBatteryAC AdapterUser Documentation
feature_bullets: Dual Mode - be more productive at school or home with the conventional laptop mode that is touch screen enabled and enjoy your favourite movies, music and video chat with ease in Stand mode

Chrome OS - Google Chrome and Lenovo have joined to create the optimum device for managing your day-to-day life. The Chrome Web Store has access to thousands of useful applications that help you succeed
Long battery life - up to eight hours battery life means you don't have to carry the charger everywhere you go
AccuType keyboard with individual rounded keys for comfortable and accurate typing
